Uses of Interface
oracle.pg.common.VertexOpCallback

  • Packages that use VertexOpCallback 
    Package Description
    oracle.pg.common
    This package contains the common logic that is shared by all the backend databases including Oracle Database, Oracle NoSQL Database, and Apache HBase.
    oracle.pg.nosql
    This package contains the logic specific to the property graph support on Oracle NoSQL Database.

    • Uses of VertexOpCallback in oracle.pg.common

      void OraclePropertyGraphBase.addAttributeToAllVertices(VertexOpCallback voc)

      void OraclePropertyGraphBase.removeAttributeFromAllVertices(VertexOpCallback voc)
